com.airbnb.paris.sample.SectionView.app:contentText:
Paris let's you create, organize and apply styles in completely new ways.

This screen is composed of 3 views of the same custom type. It has a title, content and a divider. Its 3 styles are declared and applied programmatically.

Click on a section to cycle through its styles.

Styles are separated from the layout which means you can create complex, semantic view components and customize them endlessly.\n\nThis becomes very valuable in large applications and enable the use of a common set of visual components.
Paris is used extensively at Airbnb and powers most of what's displayed on any given screen.
